titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: A very small beginning was made with the article, but not enough to guarantee

. I also wrote a little sermon for the soldiers next Sunday, but I doubt whether there are men enough left in Durham to justify a service. I attended Evensong, and afterwards walked with Cruickshank round Houghall Wood.
